snippet: Parents of 13 current and former students of Success Academy filed a complaint against the charter school network with the federal Department of Education.
abstract: Parents of 13 current and former students of Success Academy accuse charter school network in New York City of discriminating against students with disabilities and file complaint with federal Education Dept; parents say network, which is known for its students' high test scores, denies accommodations to those with disabilities and in some cases urged parents to remove children from school.
lead_paragraph: Parents of 13 current and former students of Success Academy filed a complaint against the charter school network with the federal Department of Education.

headline.main: Filing Alleges Bias at Success Academy Network Against Students With Disabilities
